content.description: A contender for best of it's grade in this hemisphere, Toe to Toe is the rare problem where a stunning feature meets incredible movement on perfect holds. Enter the ring on a proper sit start with juggy pockets and use both power and technical skills to move past the incuts, slopers and jugs to the lip, where a fun topout signals the end of the round.An alternative beta using a far hold on the right face has been discovered, but do yourself a favor and stay true to the arete (and grade), for those who exit the ring miss the prize.
content.location: Climb the stunning arete from bottom to top.

content.description: This wonderful piece of bullet rock is home to the mega-ultra-classic Toe to Toe, characterized by a steep arete.
